title: Enchanting Emerald and Diamond Haaram Set
materials: Vibrant Green). Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a delicate leafy design, meticulously handcrafted with prong-set diamonds. A vibrant oval-cut emerald serves as a focal point, complemented by matching drop earrings. The Haaram design showcases a blend of modern aesthetics with a traditional touch, lending it a timeless appeal. The gold chain is fine and detailed. Earrings feature a fan-shaped diamond design hanging from an emerald stud.
colors: with a warm yellow gold hue.
occasions: and other special occasions. Perfect for Muhurtham
and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for modern formal events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: A timeless heirloom piece, this Haaram is a testament to superior craftsmanship and exquisite design. The combination of premium diamonds and a vibrant emerald creates a stunning visual impact. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional and contemporary attire. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting luster and brilliance.
